title: Torch for Android Wear
summary: Turn your Android Wear into Torch. Useful, simple and fast.
description: Turn your Android Wear into Torch. It's useful, simple and fast. Very convenient when you urgently need some light in the dark. To start the app, Just say: OK Google... Start Torch or Open Torch.This app is compatible with LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Asus Zenwatch, Sony Smartwatch 3 and Moto 360Please note:-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Torch" or say "Open Torch"Android and Android Wear are trademarks of Google Inc.
descriptionHTML:
Turn your Android Wear into Torch. It's useful, simple and fast. Very convenient when you urgently need some light in the dark. To start the app, Just say: OK Google... Start Torch or Open Torch.

This app is compatible with LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Asus Zenwatch, Sony Smartwatch 3 and Moto 360

Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Torch" or say "Open Torch"


Android and Android Wear are trademarks of Google Inc.
comments: Asus zen - works well. Wanted a torch I could open on my watch by saying "open torch" without pressing a hundred buttons. This does it nicely. Thanks
Waste of time and data An embarrassing effort,  stay away!
Simple but works Great app for my Android wear
Basic but does it well It's quite simple, but really useful in emergency
